articles.author: Masaki Kondo, Ruth Carson
articles.title: Bearish Dollar Bets Move Toward Levels That Raise Risk of Recoil - Bloomberg.com
articles.description: Investors looking for short-term relief in the beleaguered dollar may be encouraged by technical indicators and market positioning that suggest some overshooting of bearish bets.
articles.content:
Investors looking for short-term relief in the beleaguered dollar may be encouraged by technical indicators and market positioning that suggest some overshooting of bearish bets.
